name: Visibility
desc: The visibility of a UI element, chosen automatically based on the platform, current context, and other factors.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The element may be visible or hidden depending on the policies of the component accepting the visibility configuration.

items.name: static var allCases: [Visibility]
items.desc: A collection of all values of this type.

items.name: typealias AllCases
items.desc: A type that can represent a collection of all values of this type.

items.name: static func == (Visibility, Visibility) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two visibilities are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two visibilities are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the visibility by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the visibility.
